hero.title: Hello, I'm Daniel Tanaka
hero.subtitle: Cryptocurrency trader, Kindle author, and technology enthusiast based in Europe.
hero.description: I believe that financial technology can democratize investing and trading for everyone. My passion lies in cryptocurrency markets, automated trading systems, and sharing practical insights through my books and technical projects. I specialize in Python development, market analysis, and building trading bots.

story.title: My Story
story.p1: My journey into cryptocurrency and trading began with a fascination for technology and financial markets. What started as curiosity about Bitcoin evolved into a deep passion for understanding market dynamics, sentiment analysis, and the psychological aspects of trading decisions.
story.p2: Based in Europe, I've developed expertise in Python programming, focusing on trading automation and market analysis tools. My projects range from simple trading bots to complex sentiment analysis systems that help traders overcome emotional decision-making—a common pitfall in volatile markets.
story.p3: My breakthrough came with understanding that successful trading isn't just about technical analysis or market timing—it's about emotional control and systematic approaches. This insight led to my book "Don't Lose to Fear, Buy," which explores how sentiment analysis can improve investment decisions.
story.p4: Today, I share my knowledge through Kindle books, technical articles on Qiita, and insights on Note.com. My goal is to make cryptocurrency trading and investment strategies accessible to everyone, combining technical expertise with practical, real-world applications.

2019.title: Cryptocurrency Discovery
2019.description: First discovered Bitcoin and began studying cryptocurrency markets, blockchain technology, and trading fundamentals.

2020.title: Python Development
2020.description: Started learning Python programming to build trading automation tools and market analysis systems.

2021.title: First Trading Bot
2021.description: Successfully deployed my first automated trading bot, focusing on sentiment analysis and emotional trading patterns.

2022.title: Content Creation
2022.description: Began sharing trading insights on Note.com and technical articles on Qiita, building a community of fellow traders.

2023.title: First Book Publication
2023.description: Published "Don't Lose to Fear, Buy" on Amazon Kindle, sharing sentiment analysis strategies for better investment decisions.

2024.title: Expanding Knowledge
2024.description: Continuing to publish books, develop trading tools, and share insights through multiple platforms while helping others navigate digital finance.

facts.title: Fun Facts About Me
facts.fact1: I code my trading bots at 5 AM every morning with strong European coffee—my most productive hours!
facts.fact2: My desk setup includes 3 monitors: one for coding, one for market charts, and one for social media content.
facts.fact3: I've tested over 50 different trading strategies, but sentiment analysis remains my favorite approach.
facts.fact4: Before cryptocurrency, I was fascinated by traditional stock markets and spent years learning fundamental analysis.
facts.fact5: I maintain detailed trading journals—over 1,000 entries documenting successes, failures, and lessons learned.
facts.fact6: My guilty pleasure is reading other traders' stories on social media to understand market psychology.
facts.fact7: I'm constantly learning new programming libraries—recently explored machine learning for price prediction.
facts.fact8: My favorite debugging method is explaining my code problems to my rubber duck on the desk—it works!

philosophy.title: My Trading Philosophy
philosophy.quote: "Every trade is a lesson. My job as a trader is to build systems robust enough to handle market volatility, smart enough to capitalize on opportunities, and disciplined enough to manage risk consistently."
philosophy.description: I believe in the power of systematic trading approaches combined with emotional intelligence. Whether I'm developing trading algorithms or sharing insights through my writing, my goal is always to educate, systematize, and improve trading outcomes.
